sources.title: The Last Frontier (1932) LON CHANEY JRüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Lon Chaney Jr., Dorothy Gulliver, Francis X. Bushman Jr.
Directors: Spencer Gordon Bennet, Thomas Storey

When outlaw "Tiger" Morris schemes to drive settlers off their land to gain control of the gold-rich territory, a crusading newspaper editor becomes the masked vigilante, The Black Ghost, to stop him!
  üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:09     CHAPTER 1:  The Black Ghost Rides
21:15     CHAPTER 2:  The Thundering Herd
41:50     CHAPTER 3:  The Black Ghost Strikes
59:21     CHAPTER 4:  The Fatal Shot
1:14:52  CHAPTER 5:  Clutching Sands
1:30:40  CHAPTER 6:  The Terror Trail
1:47:34  CHAPTER 7:  Doomed
2:06:09  CHAPTER 8:  Facing Death
2:23:51  CHAPTER 9:  Thundering Doom
2:41:53  CHAPTER 10: The Life Line
3:01:01  CHAPTER 11: Driving Danger
3:16:27  CHAPTER 12: The Black Ghost's Last Ride
3:31:40  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A frontier newspaper editor Kirby battles outlaw Tiger Morris who is causing indian uprisings to drive away settlers so that he will can claim a gold deposit as his own. With the help of General Custer, right wins out. Presented in serial form in 12 episodes.
metadata.Writer: George H. Plympton, Robert F. Hill, Karl R. Coolidge
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney Jr., Dorothy Gulliver, Francis X. Bushman Jr.
